pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modelling and Analysis of Leaf Gas Exchange Data // Coupled leaf gas exchange model, A-Ci curve simulation and fitting, Ball- Berry stomatal conductance models, leaf energy balance using Penman-Monteith, Cowan-Farquhar optimization, humidity unit conversions. See Duursma (2015) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0143346.
